website_summaries.verdict: A great general blind spot mirror set to buy when you want to maximize your view.
pros: Large, rectangular shape maximizes the rear view of a vehicle's blind spots
Mirror is a good size that does not block the main view of the side mirror itself
cons: Mirrors are prone to reflections that often obscure the whole view

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases ever.
customer_reviews.text: Terrific blind spot mirrors. I cannot believe the field of view I now have. These little mirrors take care of the wide blind spot we had in our Prius. We are now amidst a move up the West Coast through heavily trafficked areas and haven't had one issue with missing cars that sneak in alongside ours. We are thrilled with them. Plus, I love that they are adjustable for best views for each driver. They were easy to install, too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.K.

customer_reviews.title: Very confusing at night
customer_reviews.text: The idea is good but they take up too much room of the original mirror and at night it is a real mess if you install it per directions and it makes it difficult to tell what is going on. wish I could get my money back. -and now have to buy glue remover to get them off.
customer_reviews.author: Analyst

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I got home and noticed this mirror fell out. Pricey for a poor quality mirror. Got a few run around replies from Amazon about refund but finally got assisted and refunded. DO NOT BUY this product and don't waste your money. Dealing with refund was a headache, not a good treatment for Prime customer like me. Poor business approach.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Mirrors have tinting added
customer_reviews.text: The mirror has tinting added, so if you have tinting on your side windows it could reduce your ability to effectively use the mirrors at night. Otherwise I am happy with the size of the mirror (much larger than other blind-spot mirrors that I tried). That size makes it easier to see what is in the mirror without squinting too much. I found out the hard way that the installation instructions have a point - install mirror at the extreme interior corner (else it can make a noticeable portion of the mirror become obstructed, if you have moderate-sized car sedan mirrors).
customer_reviews.author: amazon reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect. I'm a little worried whenever I see, "As seen on TV", but this product is just amazing! Honestly I think this should be standard on all vehicles. I have a SUV and I didn't realize how bad the visibility was. I was always kind of frustrated and extra cautious when merging. Now with the extra mirrors, I can see EVERYTHING! I've had the little stick on fish eye mirrors before but theses one up those by having a swivel base, and less distorted mirror that looks more natural when viewing. Covered my blind spots completely!
customer_reviews.author: Craig H. Nisbet

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: They may not be the cheapest blind spot mirrors on Amazon but in my opinion they are worth every penny! It’s easy to see both mirrors from the driver seat and they are adjustable. The biggest advantage for me is being able to shift lanes confidently without having to crane my neck and look over my shoulders. Perfect for those with neck pain. I just ordered my third set and have been using these particular mirrors for years. They are high-quality and the image is clear. They are easier to see then any other mirror I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Sajem70

customer_reviews.title: Simple and great solution
customer_reviews.text: Am rolling in the 2017 GTI and the Left and right blind spots were really bothering me = either im just getting more paranoid as i get older or the blind spots are a little more pronounced than my last few cars , Got these bad boys, installed them left and right and played with them until they picked up from where the side mirrors left off and .... totally happy ... great product ... does what it says on the box and the build quality is really great...
customer_reviews.author: ROK2029

customer_reviews.title: Love how easy it is to see cars
customer_reviews.text: I tried the minimal-rim round blind spot mirrors and it was way too hard to spot which car was in my blind spot. With these, once the car begins to get into my blind spot it's already about 1/4 the size of the mirror. It's great! I also like how firm it is to rotate, so when I'm washing my car it won't be moved as easily. On my Tesla Model 3 I ended up rotating my entire side mirrors up and putting these on the top of the mirror and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Cloud89

customer_reviews.title: They do the job.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my BMW 335i, which has a horrendous blind spot on the driver's side created by an overly thick center pillar between the front and back seats. Even with the mirror far enough over to cover the left lane, there's still a blink spot. This little mirror took care of that problem. I also added on to my wife's Honda Oddessy, however I couldn't mount it in the upper right corner of the mirror because it's too far recessed in the mirror housing, so I mounted it to the lower right, and it works fine. Happy to "buy 'Merican".
customer_reviews.author: Hondo

customer_reviews.title: updated review
customer_reviews.text: Makes me feel safer and more confident when changing lanes. Blind spots are dangerous! These little things eliminate that danger. AND MADE IN THE USA!! 8-21-18 update: Dropped rating from 5 to 3...If I were to get this type of mirror again, I would purchase one that would NOT pivot. The problem is they may get moved and you cannot be sure they are adjusted correctly when it comes time to make that quick "check" to see if there is traffic in the blind spot.
customer_reviews.author: Wudnutt

customer_reviews.title: Great Blind Side Mirrors!!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent blind side mirrors. Expensive but effective and well worth the money. They are easy to install. They have made changing lanes so much easier. Prior to buying them, I was concerned about the possibility of them getting knocked off in automatic car washes. The manufactuer mentions this in its literature. To protect them during car washes I turn the mirrors inward and place Zip Lock Plastic Bags over them. It has worked beautifully. These mirrors are much better than the cheap little mirrors. I recommend them without reservation. Thumbs way up!
customer_reviews.author: Legaleagle

customer_reviews.title: They fall off in a week
customer_reviews.text: They are great when you first put them on. The blind spot is fully covered, you can see everything. But I saw the mirror flying off as I was driving on the freeway. I had only put the one on and it flew off in about a week. Needless to say I had followed the instructions very diligently and it seemed stuck very securely when I first installed it. I'm sending back what's left right now.
customer_reviews.author: L.K.

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Poor Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! Cheap glass. Mine was distorted at the perimeter when I received them. The glass oxidized after about 3 months. Now there are little spots all over the reflective surface and you cannot see clearly with it any more. Oh yeah and there is no warranty, only some price guaranty.
customer_reviews.author: Fraceman

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely better than those round mirrors. Doesn't give nearly as much of that "Fish eye" view as the round mirror did. Works great for driver side....but for me, passenger side not that effective. I have Weather tech rain guards on my windows so you a have to adjust placement on the morry a bit since those stick out from the door frame toward the side mirrors a bit. These mirrors, when mount on the side mir itself, stick out about an inch, they are not a flush mount style, due to the ball joint for adjustability. Definitely takes some getting used to if your are someone who has never used blind spot mirrors before.
customer_reviews.author: SpeedingCheetah

customer_reviews.title: clear and nice view. read many reviews and this one is ...
customer_reviews.text: clear and nice view. read many reviews and this one is the one.. also... don't listen to anyone about where to put the mirror.. follow the instructions on this one.. it is for a reason.. you don't want to see the back of these mirrors in your mirrors! It would drive me nuts and takes up too much room.. you see plenty with these mirrors and it is not hard to move them, yet strong enough to not move.. the best mirrors
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: These mirrors are the best!! I found as I get older freway ...
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors are the best!! I found as I get older freway driving becomes more of a challange and these mirrors really pick up the 'blindspot' very nicely. High quality item, have been through the car wash a few times and there has has not been a problem other than they need to be readjusted every time, but the 3M adhesive pad works and they have not come off or feel lose. Good item HIGHLY recommend
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say that I am not too impressed with this product. It does everything it says it will do but I find that I have to squint to see the images and they are distorted. My husband likes it, but I don't. I ended up getting an oversized rear view mirror that lets me see behind and to the sides in one quick glance.
customer_reviews.author: artist

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blind spot mirrors
customer_reviews.text: I've had these before and they went with my old car so I bought these again. The best of the blind spot mirrors. Easy to mount. Can be moved in what ever angle you need. Does not vibrate even on a bumpy road. Comes with clear instructions. Just be careful when you put them on. Once they stick on they hold very strongly. Very well designed and American made.
customer_reviews.author: Steelman

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates Your Blind Spots
customer_reviews.text: These are small mirrors that, if positioned properly, will eliminate your blind spots. I purchased them for my Honda Element, which has a huge blind spot on both sides and placed them on the upper, door side area of my mirrors. Problem solved. One of the mirrors came off of its ball mount in a car wash once but it was easily reattached. That was the only time a mirror detached itself. Once you attach the mount with the tape it isn't coming off again so make sure you put it where you want it. There is a good range of adjustment and it holds its position.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Best In Slot IM*H*O
customer_reviews.text: So I had bought 2 pairs of adjustable mirrors from MaxiView in the past. They were installed 5 years and 3 years ago on two different cars, and they're still there today working perfectly. Recently got a new car, looked up my Amazon history for the pairs I bought in the past, though they seem to be discontinued, regardless I bought this one. So far so good. Still works perfectly. They're a bit expensive, but you get what you pay for. Would recommend to all my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Hydrean

customer_reviews.title: The best out there
customer_reviews.text: The best quality and clearest blind spot mirrors out there. The only complaint I have is with the ball joint. It is plenty sturdy for spring-fall driving but if you live somewhere with heavy snowfall be prepared to lose your blind spot mirrors for the season because snow will make them fall into the most unhelpful positions and you will have to reset them frequently
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Fell off the ball
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I had high hopes as it's made in USA, however the driver's side one fell off the ball in a car was, then I had to peel it off!
customer_reviews.author: Tough on Manufacturers

customer_reviews.title: May seem pricey, but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: SO PLEASED with this purchase. Feels like it's increasing my safe driving by 500% every day. And when my side mirrors are foggy these little mirrors have stayed crystal clear. They've made my huge blind spot completely obsolete, without providing a confusing or misleading view. Seriously feels like they were meant to be there. Have gone through two car washes now with zero issues. Seemed pricey compared to others, but definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Adina Findlay

customer_reviews.title: Mirros are etremely dark
customer_reviews.text: 23 Waves - is there a protective film on these mirrors? I can't see any, but they are extremely darkened, and therefore useless at dusk and beyond. Seems like a great product except for that, but they are really needed at night, and are insufficient, thus basically useless overall. Sorry to be so harsh, but usability at night is crucial.
customer_reviews.author: dfoutz

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Truck Several Times!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Toyota Sequoia but, like any large SUV, it has a large blind spot. I bought these two years ago and am back buying another set for our teenage daughter's new car. AWESOME PRODUCT! Driving in California is crazy. I have no doubt that I would have been in two or three accidents already had I not spotted another vehicle in my blind sport due to these small mirrors. I love the fact that they are adjustable so you can view set them to view a specific area. I would recommend them without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: TomBear

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me safe.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Jeep with large blind spot on both sides. I attached these small mirrors to the top of the vehicle's side mirrors so I can see what's in those blind spots. They are doing a good job of keeping me out of potential accidents.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great mirrors with a very clear view
customer_reviews.text: Great mirrors with a very clear view! I was a bit skeptical at first, but after trying them out on my new 2018 CRV, I am very happy that I bought them. The mirrors stick very well and offer a good depth of view. Even if you adjust your side view mirrors in the recommended way as instructed by some youtube videos, there are still spots you can't see (you somehow surrender a bit depth of view from the side view mirror in that way). These blind spot mirrors help you see that. The size and shape are great, and angles can be adjusted easily.
customer_reviews.author: SuperTuotuo

customer_reviews.title: Follow the website instructions and place as far as possible ...
customer_reviews.text: Follow the website instructions and place as far as possible in the upper right and upper left corners, for the left and right mirrors, respectively. There is a video out there with a guy using tape to bombardier place the mirror to avoid housing contact when turning mirrors FULLY inward. Disregard that video. The kid does not know what he's talking about because you'll take up too much mirror real estate following his advise. I know this because I made the mistake of following his advise. AND, who's going to ever move the mirrors fully inward? No one.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Barchi

customer_reviews.title: Camaro owners rejoice! Blind spot issue has been solved!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my 2015 Camaro. Camaro’s have a notorious blind spot. Application was easy and as of 6 months later, they are still holding on. Once installed looking though side view mirrors took some adjustment. I am very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but not as clear as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not sure these are really worth the $$. The idea of being able to move them is great but one side seems really clear yet the other seems like it has a piece of plastic covering over it. QC may be an issue but they should be clear for what they cost. The cheaper oval ones at the local autozone is much clearer...?
customer_reviews.author: vrhealth

customer_reviews.title: Best on market.
customer_reviews.text: Have had several different blind spot mirrors. Most were junk. While a little pricy compared to others, you get what you pay for. These are excellent, bought a second set. Best on market and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best of any blind spot device I have ever used with minimal distortion
customer_reviews.text: Simple, quick, straightforward instructions and installation. The best thing about these mirrors for me is that I can see all surrounding traffic at all times. It is never out of my vision. After I installed them I took a test drive on a 4 lane state highway. In the outside lane I slowed slightly in light traffic, so that vehicles behind me could safely and easily change lanes to pass me. I never lost sight of any of these vehicles at any time, no matter where they were.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I installed these on my truck 2 weeks ago and they been great. It's only 30°F or lower right now so i don't know how they hold up in the heat, but they haven't budged since I put them on and there highly adjustable. I would buy again in a heart beat
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this placed on my drivers side mirror for over a year and it is holding up well. I love that is adjustable and gives a very field of view. It's never come loose and fits well in the rectangular mirror on my Dodge Grand Caravan. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: bmak

customer_reviews.title: A Must for Your Vehicle
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing, practical, useful, and safety conscious product you can imagine. While driving your vehicle, it takes the place of a factory installed blind spot indicator system. I had one of those in my Chrysler Town and County. At 60,000 miles it went kaput... The cost to "fix" the problem was a rip off of $2400.00. I order the MaxiView and could not ever be happier with a product that promotes safety on the road.Love, love, love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna deWitt-Schnell

customer_reviews.title: Great little mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Best blind spot mirrors I've ever used. After 6 months, they're still perfect. Took a little getting used to, but now I wouldn't drive on a multi lane road without them. I usually have to readjust them after the car wash but, that's to be expected and with normal use they stay adjusted just fine without loosening up. Word of caution, be sure of your positioning before you stick them on. Once theyre on, they're not coming off and that's what you'll be stuck with.
customer_reviews.author: D. Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Great for blind spot viewing
customer_reviews.text: We bought these years ago for our two cars. Eventually they fogged on the car that is left outside (but are still fine on the garaged one) so we are replacing the fogged ones. They are great quality, much nicer than the cheap ones sold in the auto parts stores. And they are wonderful to use to show vehicles traveling in the "blind spot" next to your car..
customer_reviews.author: FloridaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works very well and am very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and am very happy with the product. One installation issue: they tell you to install it as high up in the corner as possible but on my car that limits my ability to adjust how high/far back the mirror is directed. I look a little too low on the right side but it still works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara hort geek

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy to install! Much better than the 7.95 ones I bought at WM and broke my mirror trying to remove. These are worth the extra as long as they stay attached and I'm comfortable they will. I'm considering another set for my other Jeep. It's been a couple of weeks now and they are still adhered well and doing the job. I would buy again. Probably will get for my Liberty, but got to finish spending on my new Wrangler first.
customer_reviews.author: Ed SCSC

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 5 years
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair I’ve bought em. First pair or mirrors were ordered about 5 years ago, and never failed. Ordered new ones due to weathering overtime to the reflection. Great for Silverado’s.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M.

customer_reviews.title: Works better than cheap mirrors at auto parts stores.
customer_reviews.text: Works well to see in my blind spot. Adjustable. Easy to install. Excellent for someone who has difficulty turning to look for cars in the blind spot. This safety device should be on every vehicle. Could be priced lower so more people get this.
customer_reviews.author: Christene

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It works, I like it. It feels like it should last forever, I'll update my review in case it fails. Only thing is I feel like it may be overpriced, but can't always buy good quality for cheap, so I expect them to hold out for longer. I've gotten used to driving with blind spot mirrors, it's safer and easier. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mirrors!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mirrors - should have bought these first! Instead I tried something else in an effort to save a few bucks - don't make the same mistake! These are as good as the ones I had built into the previous car we had - they easily cover your blind spots and they're really quick to install. Highly recommend them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Book fans

customer_reviews.title: convex mirror.
customer_reviews.text: this product did not fit my bill it is too clumsy and did not look right and I could not see what I needed to on the passenger side.
customer_reviews.author: L.K.

customer_reviews.title: They are very high quality and provide an excellent field of view
customer_reviews.text: I've now purchased my 3rd pair of these mirrors because they are worth it. They are very high quality and provide an excellent field of view. I always see cars in my blind spots now. I originally bought these because I had pulled a muscle in my neck and this made checking blind spots difficult and painful. Since then, I've grown to rely almost entirely on these mirrors for checking blind spots.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Useful and really works.
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to move once mounted and allowed to set. However, it’s very useful once installed. Be careful to ensure that there is space around the mirror to maneuver it around while installing it. It’s very useful and high quality although the adhesive might melt if you stay in very hot climate. Amazon Customer care and the seller were very understanding and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I use them in my raise truck. I love the cover area. Very dependable and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Al J Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Let you see easily your dead angles on both sides of the car. Easy to install. First had a problem seeing at distance in the main mirror, but after adjusting it a little higher this was solved. Can not be compared with ordinary cheap round mirrors, much and much better.
customer_reviews.author: Willem

customer_reviews.title: These are the best blind spot mirrors
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a handful of styles and these are the best value, visibility and size. Definitely worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Sturdivant

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA not always better.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price I ordered these and an other brand from ebay. These were 26 the others were about 6. The build quality on the backs of the mirror are strong and look like they will last. The mirror potion not great as the 6 dollar ones look better and clearer. Made in the USA in this particular case just means more money
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Best "blind spot" protection
customer_reviews.text: We have these on both vehicles. They really do work!!! We no longer have large "blind spots". I feel more comfortable changing lanes because I have a clear view of what is coming up next to me. Almost got in accident with our SUV because of blind spot, so I researched until I found these and they have saved us many times!
customer_reviews.author: Wizard50

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be installed on OUTSIDE edge not inside. Otherwise it impedes view of side mirror
customer_reviews.author: Irv Evans

customer_reviews.title: For those who still turn and look back... buy this
customer_reviews.text: I am 100% confident for the first time ever that I don’t have to look at my mirror than look behind me. Truly a great product
customer_reviews.author: Jilly

customer_reviews.title: 2 in the box, Made In America  and built good
customer_reviews.text: Made in America and though the packaging is not clear there are actually 2 mirrors in the box but on the box it says” CONTENTS One Mirror and Installation Instructions I was ticked at first because for the price 2 is fare so happy it had two in the box. Plus they are built well.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Ruppert

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but features and quality are top notch
customer_reviews.text: I love these mirrors! I have installed these on 3 vehicles thusfar. The ability to adjust them after installation is a plus. The visual to see vehicles is better than others and does appear a little bit larger than other blind mirrors I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: GH Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend these mirrors.
customer_reviews.text: I found these mirrors to be extreme;y useful. They do take a little getting use to. I found theta be useful in seeral different ways. It makes it easier to see cars coming when merging on a freeway without twisting your neck to look back. I have also noticed that when backing out of a parking space the wide angle allows you to see cross traffic before they are directly behind you. I definitely feel they are useful for preventing collisions in several situations.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne E. Fogle

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not only did I buy one for my car, I bought my daughter one for her car. It really makes a huge difference in your ability to see "blind spots" on both sides of your car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Product
customer_reviews.text: Top quality product. Durable. Pivot remains tight and stable over lifetime. Excellent field of view. Better than most competitive products. Good adhesion, but thicker foam backing performs better on slightly curved surfaces. Thanks for manufacturing in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: The Discriminator

customer_reviews.title: Best blind spot mirrors we’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th set of these mirrors that we’ve purchased - 4 different minivans. They are by far the absolute best blind spot mirrors we’ve ever used. They adjust! That makes it easy for you to get your exact correct angle. I would recommend these mirrors for anyone who has a blind spot problem. Our latest car has a blind spot warning chime, but I still want to see exactly what in in my blind spot. Can’t wait to get these mirrors - I’ve been whipping my head around to check and see what’s there. Safe driving!
customer_reviews.author: Michael M. Miklos

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: I drive a lot, these blind spot mirrors are great! My car has a high rear deck and tinted windows which makes it near impossible to see the next lane over, especially on my right. I was able to adjust the mirrors just right and now I see what I could be missing. I highly recommend these mirrors, they save you the trouble of having to look over your shoulder when merging to another lane.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Best small mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Now on my 4th vehicle. This time I've covered the poor blind spot mirrors on an F-150 and put these over them. The best small blind spot mirrors out there.
customer_reviews.author: Donn Fishburn

customer_reviews.title: clear visibility
customer_reviews.text: good size, angle, and optics. will last, so it was worth paying more than the cheap chinese brands.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: These are awful
customer_reviews.text: You constantly have to adjust. If you go thru a car wash, they have to be readjusted every time. Not worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Safer Driving
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t feel comfortable driving my new car after realizing I had a terrible blind spot. After reading the reviews I ordered the MaxiView lens. Today I was able to drive with peace of mind. I can now see what was hidden before. Very pleased with my purchase. As far as the seller, 5 stars. Arrived when promised and no issues with package or merchandise damages.
customer_reviews.author: L. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: These are great blind spot mirrors! I've tried several others and was never impressed (especially with the blue-tinted ones). I purchased these after reading many of the reviews and I'm happy I did. THEY WORK GREAT!!
customer_reviews.author: TN Lady

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT SO FAR
customer_reviews.text: I just installed the mirrors. I can't comment to how long they'll stay stuck to my side mirrors after a car wash. But the size is big and images are clear. My only gripe is that it sits a little too high for my preference.
customer_reviews.author: Ed P.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on my truck mirrors last week. Appear to work well. However, with a large vehicle these are incredibly small in size when placed on my outside mirrors. I would have much preferred that they come in two sizes. For my truck mirrors, these should be twice as large as they come sold. If they were larger they would have earned a 4 or 5 star rating. Too small.
customer_reviews.author: Graywolf0310

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These work excellent. I have a few blinds spots in my car and these help! Caution: once they are on, THEY are ON. So plan to move your mirrors to make sure they aren't to close to the side.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Pay more get more. These are not the cheapo blind spot mirrors you get at AutoZone, they almost feel like an OEM part.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Freitas

customer_reviews.title: CAN SEE MY BLIND SPOT CLEARLY
customer_reviews.text: THEY WORK VERY GOOD CAN SEE CARS ON YOUR BLIND SIDE

customer_reviews.title: adhesive is not sticking very well
customer_reviews.text: my husband applied it in our car 3 days ago. He went to carwash the car this afternoon then this fell while doing the automatic carwash. Not worth it! We cant even return it because it fell inside the carwash station! its a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Does the job! 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Mobility allows for optimal views. Only thing I complain about is CARS ARE MUCH CLOSER THAN THEY APPEAR!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for new drivers
